name: wristband
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece of material that goes around the wrist, for example to hold a watch
Issarawat Tattong/Moment/GettyImages
a piece of material that people wear around their wrists to show that they support a particular organization or idea
Willowpix/E+/GettyImages
